active.description: Indicates whether the subscription is currently active or not

portalId.description: The unique identifier for the portal associated with the subscription

description.description: Additional information or details about the subscription

id.description: The unique identifier for the subscription

name.description: The display name of the subscription

order.description: The order in which the subscription is displayed or processed

businessUnitId.description: The unique identifier for the business unit associated with the subscription

internal.description: Indicates whether the subscription is for internal use only

internalName.description: The internal name for the subscription

category.description: The category to which the subscription belongs

channel.description: The communication channel through which the subscription is managed
